name: no step on snek (DoorHallGames)
description:
This game was made in 4 hours due to bad time management and late entry into the jam. I apologize for the following experience. 

At least the music and art are both dope.

Art: https://jekkey.itch.io/

Music: https://twitter.com/minivergames

GameDev: https://www.youtube.com/c/DoorHallGames

This game is an entry for CCCJam. Theme: "Playing Both Sides". Because you play both sides. Of the snek. Pretty obvious I think.
